thread.title: Colts Top Texans On "Thursday Night Football"
thread.title_full: Colts Top Texans On "Thursday Night Football"

title: Colts Top Texans On "Thursday Night Football"
text:
Posted Friday, October 9th 2015 @ 9am 
Andre Johnson made his former team pay as the Colts topped the Texans, 27-20, on "Thursday Night Football". Johnson caught a pair of touchdown passes from 40-year-old Matt Hasselbeck, who filled in for the injured Andrew Luck for the second straight game. Johnson spent his first 12 NFL seasons with the Texans before joining the Colts this year. Indianapolis has won three straight to improve to 3-and-2. Houston dropped to 1-and-4. { "position1" : { "type" : "show", "id" : 19228209, "name" : "Bleacher Report - NFL", "description" : "Report - Videos - NFL", "slug" : "Bleacher-Report-NFL" } }
